name: Plan T - Organic Low FODMAP Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Low FODMAP Oatmeal: 1/2 cup organic rolled oats, 1 cup organic lactose-free milk, 1 tbsp organic maple syrup, 1/4 cup organic strawberries, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter
Breakfast.instructions: Cook oats with milk. Top with maple syrup, strawberries, and peanut butter.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Rice Cakes with Protein: 2 organic rice cakes, 4 oz organic sliced turkey breast, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Top rice cakes with turkey. Drizzle with olive oil.

Lunch.details: Organic Grilled Chicken and Quinoa: 6 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic steamed carrots and green beans, 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tsp organic herbs de Provence
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken with herbs. Serve with quinoa and steamed vegetables drizzled with olive oil.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein Smoothie: 1 scoop organic low FODMAP protein powder, 1 cup organic lactose-free milk, 1/2 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic almond butter

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Hard-Boiled Eggs with Fruit: 2 organic hard-boiled eggs, 1 organic orange
Post-Workout Snack.instructions: Enjoy hard-boiled eggs with a side of orange slices.

Dinner.details: Organic Grilled Salmon with Rice and Vegetables: 6 oz organic grilled salmon, 1 cup cooked organic white rice, 1 cup organic roasted zucchini and bell peppers, 1 tbsp organic lemon juice, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Dinner.instructions: Grill salmon. Roast vegetables. Serve with rice, drizzled with lemon juice and olive oil.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Low FODMAP Trail Mix: 1/4 cup organic walnuts, 1/4 cup organic pumpkin seeds, 2 tbsp organic dark chocolate chips
